name: @kawaz/stream-bridge
description: A utility library that provides bidirectional conversion between Node.js streams and Web Stream API streams

scripts.build: bun exec 'rm -rf dist'; bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target=node --minify --sourcemap=linked; tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --noEmit false
